title: Threats of salmon farming on wild salmon

content.prompt: Salmon farming threatens the health of wild salmon stocks primarily because

choices.label: salmon farming prevents commercial fishing fleets from overharvesting wild salmon
salmon farming prevents interbreeding between domesticated varieties of salmon and their wild counterparts
farmed salmon can spread parasites and disease to wild salmon
farmed salmon compete with wild salmon for spawning sites
farmed salmon can contain chemicals derived from food additives and antibiotics that may be harmful to human consumers

skill.text: Skill 7.C: Describe disadvantages, advantages, or unintended consequences for potential solutions.
